attributes.action: Prevent any dentists going private and tax private dentist to remain private.
attributes.additional_details: Emergency legislation needs to be passed in parliament to prevent any dentist going private. Additionally, a retro bill to get a windfall payment for a dentist to remain private or return them all to the NHS needs to be created immediately. The NHS dentistry is dying.
attributes.background: NHS dentistry is continuing to go private. Millions now have no access to NHS dentistry mostly the vulnerable; young, pensioners and poor. This must stop.

rejection.details:
Most dentists working in dental practices who offer NHS dental services are self-employed contractors, not NHS employees, and this is not changing.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to ban private dental services, or increase the tax on income from private dental services, if either of those are things you want to happen.
